languages.text: {n}В зычном голосе Волка звучит хриплый рев бурана.{/n} "Проклятье Вульфена — самый страшный и жестокий враг на Фенрисе. В сердце каждого брата живет темный зверь, кровавый и вечно голодный. Он жаждет убивать — не ради славы, долга и товарищей, а лишь ради убийства. В резне для него нет радости и азарта, а есть лишь тупая злоба".

{n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."
languages.original_text: {n}В зычном голосе Волка звучит хриплый рев бурана.{/n} "Проклятье Вульфена — самый страшный и жестокий враг на Фенрисе. В сердце каждого брата живет темный зверь, кровавый и вечно голодный. Он жаждет убивать — не ради славы, долга и товарищей, а лишь ради убийства. В резне для него нет радости и азарта, а есть лишь тупая злоба".

traits.locale_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. Wulfen was a bitter and proud man who dared to drink from Russ's cup before the Primarch himself. He was cursed and turned into a beast, his outer appearance matching his inner spite. He was a lesson to all Wolves."

{n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. Wulfen was a bitter and proud man who dared to drink from Russ's cup before the Primarch himself. He was cursed and turned into a beast, his outer appearance matching his inner spite. He was a lesson to all Wolves."

He was a lesson to all Wolves."

In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

languages.text: {n}野狼的声音中响起了风暴的轰隆声。{/n}“狼人诅咒是整个芬里斯最恐怖、最邪恶的敌人。我们每位兄弟心中都住着一只邪恶的野兽，渴求血腥，不知满足。这只野兽渴望杀戮，既不是为了荣誉，也不是为了责任，更不是为了保护战友，仅仅是为了杀戮本身。对于那些堕落为野兽的人而言，杀戮既没有快乐，也没有刺激，只有沉闷的怨恨。”
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}老狼的声音中响起了风暴的轰隆声。{/n}“狼人诅咒是整个芬里斯最恐怖、最邪恶的敌人。狼人沃芬是个傲慢的家伙，总是对别人心怀怨恨。他竟敢在我们的基因原体黎曼·鲁斯面前，用他的杯子喝酒。于是，他遭到了诅咒，变成了一头怪物。他怨毒的内心得到了与之相符的邪恶外表。对狼群的所有人而言，他都是个教训。”

languages.text: {n}El rugido de una tormenta se hace oír en la voz del Lobo.{/n} «La Maldición de los Wulfen es el enemigo más temible y espantoso en Fenris. En cada uno de nuestros hermanos vive una bestia oscura, sangrienta y siempre voraz. Ansía matar. No por la gloria, ni por el deber ni por sus hermanos de batalla, sino por el hecho de matar. Y quien sucumbe a esa siniestra bestia no conoce la alegría ni la emoción de la matanza, solo experimenta un rencor entumecido».
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rugido de una tormenta se hace oír en la voz del Lobo.{/n} «La Maldición de los Wulfen es el enemigo más temible y espantoso en Fenris. Wulfen era un hombre amargado y orgulloso que osó beber de la copa de Russ delante del propio Primarca. Fue maldito y transformado en bestia para que su aspecto exterior reflejara su rencor interior. Sirvió de lección para todos los Lobos».

languages.text: {n}狼の声の中に嵐の轟く音が響く。{/n}「『狂狼の呪い』はフェンリスで最も恐ろしく、最も手のつけられない敵だ。どんな同胞の心の中にも、血に飢えた欲が尽きない暗い獣が住んでいる。奴は殺しに飢えていて…それは名誉や義務、戦友のためなんかじゃなく、あるのはただ殺すという欲求だけ。その暗い獣に堕ちた者に待ち受けるのは、殺しの喜びや興奮じゃない、薄汚れた憎しみだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}狼の声に嵐の唸り声が響く。{/n}「『狂狼の呪い』はフェンリスで最も恐ろしく、最も恐ろしい敵だ。ウルフェンは総主長を差し置いてラスの杯を飲もうとした、恨みがましく高慢な男だった。彼は呪いをかけられ獣と化した。その内面と容貌が同じくなったのだ。こうして、彼は全ての狼にとって教訓となった」

languages.text: {n}Das tiefe Brüllen eines Sturms grollt in der Stimme des Wolfs.{/n} "Der Fluch des Wulfen ist der furchterregendste und grausamste Feind auf ganz Fenris. Im Herzen eines jeden Bruders lebt eine dunkle Bestie, blutig und ständig hungrig. Sie giert danach, zu töten – nicht für Ruhm oder aus Pflichtgefühl oder für ihre Kampfbrüder, sondern allein um des Tötens willen. Denn wer dieser dunklen Bestie zum Opfer fällt, erlebt ein Gemetzel ohne Freude, ohne Fieber, da ist nur ein stumpfer Groll."
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das tiefe Brüllen eines Sturms grollt in der Stimme des Wolfs.{/n} "Der Fluch des Wulfen ist der furchterregendste und grausamste Feind auf ganz Fenris. Der Wulfen war ein verbitterter, stolzer Mann, der es wagte, vor dem Primarchen selbst aus Russ' Kelch zu trinken. Er wurde verflucht und in ein Untier verwandelt, auf dass seine äußere Erscheinung seinem inneren Groll entspreche. Er war eine Lektion für alle Wölfe."

languages.text: {n}Le rugissement guttural d'un orage gronde dans la voix du Space Wolf.{/n} « La Malédiction du Wulfen est l'ennemi le plus terrifiant et le plus puissant de Fenris. Dans le cœur de chaque frère vit un monstre sombre, sanguinaire et vorace. Il vit pour le meurtre ; pas pour la gloire, le devoir ni même ses frères de bataille, mais uniquement dans le but de tuer. Celui qui succombe à l'influence de la bête ne trouve nulle joie ou ivresse dans le massacre, seulement une rancœur sourde. »
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rugissement guttural d'un orage gronde dans la voix du Space Wolf.{/n} « La Malédiction du Wulfen est l'ennemi le plus terrifiant et le plus puissant de Fenris. Wulfen était un homme fier et arrogant qui a osé boire dans la coupe de Russ avant le Primarque lui-même. Il fut maudit et changé en bête pour que son apparence extérieure reflète la hargne qui l'habitait. Son destin sert de leçon à tous les Space Wolves. »

languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

languages.text: {n}Kurt'un sesinde gürleyen bir fırtına yükseliyor.{/n} "Börü Laneti, Fenris'teki en korkunç ve fena düşmandır. Oradaki tüm kardeşlerimin kalbinde kanlı, yırtıcı ve karanlık bir yaratık yatar. Öldürmeye açtır. Şan, görev aşkı veya savaşdaşları için de değil, sadece öldürmüş olmak için. O karanlık canavara teslim olanlar için öldürmenin bir neşesi veya heyecanı yoktur, yalnızca gözü hiçbir şeyi görmeyen bir kini vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The guttural roar of a storm rumbles in the Wolf's voice.{/n} "The Curse of the Wulfen is the most fearsome and most terrible foe on Fenris. In the heart of every brother there lives a dark beast, bloody and forever ravenous. He hungers to kill — not for glory, or duty, or his battle-brothers, but solely for the sake of killing. For he who falls to that dark beast, there is no joy or thrill in slaughter, there is but dull rancour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kurt'un sesinde gürleyen bir fırtına yükseliyor.{/n} "Börü Laneti, Fenris'teki en korkunç ve fena düşmandır. Oradaki tüm kardeşlerimin kalbinde kanlı, yırtıcı ve karanlık bir yaratık yatar. Öldürmeye açtır. Şan, görev aşkı veya kardeşleri için de değil, sadece öldürmüş olmak için. O karanlık canavara teslim olanlar için öldürmenin bir neşesi veya heyecanı yoktur, yalnızca gözü hiçbir şeyi görmeyen bir kini vardır."
